text: The Nandi Award for Best Female Playback Singer was commissioned since 1977. As of now S. Janaki and K. S. Chitra won 12 & 11 awards respectively, followed by P. Susheela with 6 wins. ==Winners== {| class="infobox" style="width: 25em; text-align: center; font-size: 70%; vertical-align: middle;" |+ List of winners of Nandi Awards for Best Playback Singer Female |- | colspan="2" style="text-align:center;" | |- style="background:#d9e8ff; text-align:center;" !style="vertical-align: middle;"| Artist | style="background:#cec; font- size:8pt; width:60px;"| Wins |- style="background:#eef;" | style="text- align:center;" | ;S.
